http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab.value: Bright Future Group for People with Disabilities

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.value: Bright Future Group for People with Disabilities - non-profit organization of people with mobility impairments, who work as volunteers for people with disabilities in Vietnam. Established in 1988 by Hanoi former students and based in Vietnam. In 1995, the Bright Future Group became a member of the Society of Support for Hanoi Handicapped and Orphans (SSHHO). It is also a member of the Vietnam Association for Rehabilitation (VINAREHA). The activities of the Group include two major projects on vocational training in computer technology and English language study for people with disabilities.
